thread.title: Charlotte Crosby puts on steamy display with Stephen Bear
thread.title_full: Charlotte Crosby puts on steamy display with Stephen Bear | Daily Mail Online

author: Ciara Farmer For Mailonline
title: Charlotte Crosby puts on steamy display with Stephen Bear

organizations.name: pap zoey black bardot split knee jumpsuit steal charlotte

text:
Rumours of their romance have reached fever pitch of late.
And Celebrity Big Brother winners Charlotte Crosby and Stephen Bear appeared to firmly confirm their romance as they locked lips while enjoying a date in London .
The 26-year-old former Geordie Shore star enjoyed the day out shortly before her beau's ex-girlfriend, Jemma Lucy lashed out at the couple by claiming Bear is a cheater and Charlotte is a 'downgrade from her'.
Scroll down for video
Oh my! Celebrity Big Brother winners Charlotte Crosby and Stephen Bear appeared to firmly confirm their romance as they locked lips while enjoying a date in London
Charlotte looked stunning as she enjoyed a day out with the fellow reality star, as she flaunted her slimmed-down figure in a ripped jumpsuit.
She added a splash of colour to the ensemble with her bang on-trend red trainers, complete with a lace-up detail and two-tone effect.
The stunner wore her long ombre locks in loose waves cascading over her shoulders while her make-up was minimal with her plump pout dabbed with a taupe lipstick.
Despite being on the arm of her beau, Charlotte appeared far more interested in her phone than Bear despite his keen attempts to cosy up to her.
Loved-up: The 26-year-old former Geordie Shore star enjoyed the day out shortly before her beau's ex-girlfriend, Jemma Lucy lashed out at the couple by claiming Bear is a cheater and Charlotte is a 'downgrade from her'
That was then... The happy couple split in November

Coming up trumps: The couple looked enamoured
Ring ring: Despite being on the arm of her beau, Charlotte appeared far more interested in her phone than Bear despite his keen attempts to cosy up to her

Even when she's at her most casual, Charlotte Crosby still looks stylish.
Heading out and about in London, the reality star looked relaxed yet on-trend in burgundy trainers teamed with a cool all-in-one.
We love this sporty take on a jumpsuit, featuring jogger style bottoms and a jersey material. The off-the-shoulder design and slit knees give it a fashion-forward edge though.
If you're prone to reaching for your old jeans when it comes to your off-duty looks, why not mix things up and try this sporty jumpsuit instead? After all, the athleisure look is one of this season's biggest trends.
Click right to nab Charlotte's style from Miss Pap for the bargain price of £25, or shop around with the off-the-shoulder numbers below from Missy Empire, Missguided and Boohoo.

Bear, who soared to fame on Ex On The Beach, kept things super low-key and sporty, with striped tracksuit bottoms paired with a bomber jacket and hoodie.
Tucked under his arm was a huge Mulberry holdall, which possibly belonged to Charlotte as she went without a bag while strolling through the city.
When they headed into the hotel, they seemed to steal a moment to get up close and personal as they enjoyed a super steamy smooching session.
The couple's career history follows a similar path, as both stars have appeared on Ex On The Beach and Celebrity Big Brother, yet their paths did not cross on either show.
Easy now: Tucked under his arm was a huge Mulberry holdall, which possibly belonged to Charlotte as she went without a bag while strolling through the city
Chilled out: The duo looked happy and comfortable in their company
Both Charlotte and Bear won Big Brother, in 2013 and 2016 respectively, while their EOTB appearances both occurred in 2015, in the second and third season.
Yet another Ex On The Beach star is Jemma, who was on the warpath when news of the coupling was announced - as she hit out at her ex boyfriend.
Jemma and Bear dated in November before she caught him cheating, as she posted a note of Twitter reading: 'Bear can do what he wants he's single - I f**ked him off weeks ago as I caught him cheating. I wish him luck and especially her'.
Old wounds seemingly run deep as she hosted a question-and-answer session with fans, when a follower asked: 'jem do you support their relationship? Good to see a girl not being bitter...'
Stars: Both Charlotte and Bear won Big Brother, in 2013 and 2016 respectively, while their EOTB appearances both occurred in 2015, in the second and third season
Kiss kiss: Jemma and Bear dated in November before she caught him cheating, as she posted a note of Twitter reading: 'Bear can do what he wants he's single - I f**ked him off weeks ago as I caught him cheating. I wish him luck and especially her'
Cheater? Jemma replied: 'He will cheat on her like he did me, serves her right for going after all my exes pretty funny really'
Jemma replied: 'He will cheat on her like he did me, serves her right for going after all my exes pretty funny really'.
Another user grilled the star over her one night of passion with Charlotte's on-off beau Gary 'Gaz' Beadle during her stint on Ex On The Beach's fifth season last year as the Quote: : '@jem_lucy didn't you literally f**k gaz on ex on the beach though?'
She hit back: 'Yeah he's not her ex boyfriend tho plus I was put in a room with him with loads of booze and I'm not dating him'.
Jemma also retweeted a message reading: '@jem_lucy Charlotte is such a downgrade from u anyway it's funny'.
Upgrade ya? Jemma also retweeted a message reading: '@jem_lucy Charlotte is such a downgrade from u anyway it's funny'
